Be aware of phishing attempts
Examples:
Any messages (in the form of emails, Chat, or even phone calls) that may at first appear legitimate. The Lazada logo may even be used to make the communication appear legitimate. You may be asked to verify a transaction or delivery address, review a payment, confirm verification codes or One Time Passwords (OTP), or perform any other action. Upon closer inspection, you will notice tell-tale signs that indicate it is a phishing attempt.

Fraudulently using the name of Lazada and its affiliates or posing as Lazada customer service and even using Lazada logo.

Look out for the following to help you identify if it is a phishing attempt: Sender's email address, website domain name, email content, phone number of the requestor, spelling errors, inconsistent capitalization, irrelevant content, grammar mistakes.

NEVER share any One Time Passwords that you may receive.

REMEMBER:
Lazada will not contact you directly to ask for any information except under very limited circumstances. Be wary of anyone claiming to be a Lazada employee or a Lazada Seller asking for any kind of information from you, and please notify us immediately.

Avoid sharing personal information with others.

Keep all communication within the Lazada application or website as much as possible (use the Q&A section or Direct Messaging option) 

Only make payment for orders via the Lazada application or website. Should an outside party attempt to persuade you to make a bank transfer (or other direct payment to them), please notify us immediately - this includes payment of any 'additional fees'.

questions: What should i know before cancelling order

intents.response:
Before cancelling an order, please read and understand the following terms & conditions:
	Lazada cannot reverse a cancellation once it is completed. After cancellation, we cannot restore your order.
	Any vouchers, discounts, or promotions used in conjunction with a cancelled order WILL NOT be valid or re-validated for any subsequent order.
	We can't guarantee that the price, availability, shipping fee, or any other element of a cancelled order will remain the same for any subsequent order.
	Your refund will be processed within 48 hours and will be credited to your account within 5 to 15 business days, depending on your payment method, bank and/or financial institution.
	The refund amount will be the net amount paid (or store credit used) by you and will not include any voucher amount.
	In some cases, a cancellation can't be processed online. Please contact our customer service if your cancellation is declined.
	The remaining order's value after your cancellation has to fulfil the same conditions for discounts, promotions, or minimum purchase value that applied to the order. If not, the entire order may be cancelled.
	To ensure an enjoyable and safe shopping environment for all, Lazada has limited the quantity you may purchase on deals which are in high demand. We may also cancel an order if fraud is suspected.

questions: What is SST and does Lazada charge it?
Will i be charged for single-stage tax (SST)
Is there any SST in lazada
Do lazada collect SST
Will  lazada charge us for SST when we buy stuff
intents.response:
1.Sales Tax is a single-stage tax charged and levied:
	i.On locally manufactured goods, either at the time of importation or at the same time the goods are sold or otherwise disposed of by the manufacturer.
	ii.On taxable goods imported into Malaysia.
2.Lazada is NOT liable to be registered under the Sales Tax Act 2018, hence all goods sold by Lazada is not subjected to Sales Tax.
3.Service Tax (6 %) is charged on:
	i.Any taxable services provided by any taxable person in Malaysia in the course and furtherance of business.
	ii.Taxable Person - any person who belongs in Malaysia and is prescribed to a Taxable Service Any service prescribed to be a taxable service except for imported or exported services.
4.Lazada Malaysia as a Service Tax Registered company under Service Tax ACT 2018, will impose 6% of Service Tax on certain fees.
